Raleigh.William G. Enloe High School: William G. Enloe GT/IB Center for the Humanities, Sciences, and the Arts, also called William G. Enloe High School, Enloe Magnet High School and Enloe High School, is a public magnet high school offering Gifted & Talented and International Baccalaureate programs located in eastern Raleigh, North Carolina. It is operated under the Wake County Public School System. The school is named after William Gilmore Enloe, the Mayor of Raleigh at the time the school was opened.
